titleStmt.title: A quickening word for the hastening a sluggish soul to a seasonable answer to the divine call published by a poor sinner that found it such to him. Being the last sermon preached in the First Church of Boston upon Isaiah 55.6 by the pastor there, on the 24th of the fifth moneth, 1670.
titleStmt.author: Oxenbridge, John, 1609-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. G[reen] and M. J[ohnson],

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Oxenbridge. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Printer's names suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: some pages have faded print.
Reproduction of original in: New York Public Library.
